actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that the United States Postal Service shall use the mail transportation services provided by Amtrak if such use does not result in deterioration of mail services or increased costs to the Federal Government.

summary.text: Requires the United States Postal Service to use the railroad services operated by the National Railroad Passenger Corporation to transport the mail unless such services downgrade postal services or increase postal costs.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the United States Postal Service shall use the mail transportation services provided by Amtrak if such use does not result in deterioration of mail services or increased costs to the Federal Government.
